Uses of Interface
jpo.NodeSelectionListener

Uses of NodeSelectionListener in jpo
 

Classes in jpo that implement NodeSelectionListener
 class CleverJTree
          The is one of the main classes in the JPO application as it is an extended JTree that deals with most of the logic surrounding the collection and the user interactions with it.
 

Fields in jpo declared as NodeSelectionListener
 NodeSelectionListener PictureViewer.myListener
          a link back to the datamodel so that the PicturePaneClass can send in a change node request
 

Methods in jpo with parameters of type NodeSelectionListener
 void PictureViewer.addNodeSelectionListener(NodeSelectionListener listener)
          method that allows an object to register itself as a NodeSelectionListener for thumbnail selecting events.
